    • run

      public void run() throws IOException
      Menu for manager, uses 5 options, 1st calls addCourse(), 2nd calls addCourseToStudent(Student),

      3rd calls showStudents(), 4th calls assignCourseToTeacher(Teacher, Course), 5th calls exit()

      Throws:
      IOException - when the error happens in one of the methods or in the menu
